# modalPresentationStyle

**Instance Property**

The presentation style for the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor override dynamic var modalPresentationStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property always sets the presentation style for the view controller to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/pageSheet].
title: modalPresentationStyle
